tool_description: Evaluates whether claim amounts fall within policy coverage limits and determines available coverage amounts.

policy_limits.description: List of policy coverage limits by type

aggregate_used.description: Amount of aggregate limit already used this policy period

error_messages: Invalid policy limits: Policy limits must be provided in structured format with limit types and amounts.
Claim amount invalid: Claim amount must be a positive number.
Coverage type mismatch: Coverage type does not match any policy limits provided.
Aggregate calculation error: Aggregate used amount cannot exceed policy aggregate limits.
usage: Provide policy_limits, claim_amount, and coverage_type to evaluate coverage adequacy. Optionally specify aggregate_used for policies with aggregate limits. Returns limit analysis and available coverage.

within_limits.description: Whether claim amount is within policy limits

applicable_limit.description: Coverage limit that applies to this claim

available_coverage.description: Maximum amount available for this claim

limit_excess.description: Amount by which claim exceeds limits, if any
